original: Eliason, Severin, direktör, Kinna-hult, f. 15/7/79 i Örby, Älvsb. 1., av Elias Andersson o. Edela Jönsson. — Res. t. Tyskl. 19 o. 21, Ungern 38. Bruk. Rättaregården o. Södergården i Kinna 03-20, alltj. inneh. av dessa, grund. A-B Sv. Wellpappfabr. i Kin-nahult 29, dir. o. huv:deläg. där sed. 29. Ordf. i styr. f. detta föret. sed. 29, led. av Kinna kyrko- o. skolråd 22-32, led. av styr. f. Gbgs Banks avd:-kont. i Kinna sed. 28, omb :man f. Kinna kvarn o. allmänningar. Medl. av klubben Enigheten i Gbg.
translated: Eliason, Severin, director, Kinna-hult, b. 15/7/79 in Örby, Älvsborgs län, son of Elias Andersson and Edela Jönsson. - Res. to Germany in 1919 and 1921, Hungary in 1938. Managed Rättaregården and Södergården in Kinna from 1903 to 1920, owning both continuously. Founded AB Swedish Corrugated Paper Factory in Kinna-hult in 1929, serving as director and majority owner since then. Chairman of the board of this company since 1929, member of Kinna church and school council from 1922 to 1932, member of the board of Gothenburg Bank's branch office in Kinna since 1928, representative for Kinna's mill and common land. Member of the Enigheten club in Gothenburg.
